skindar.name: Marl Skindar
skindar.title: Republic Intelligence Operative
skindar.description: A master spy masquerading as a corporate agent, buried so deep in cover that even allies forget who he really is.
skindar.philosophy: Information wins wars. Visibility gets you killed.
skindar.voiceStyle: Dry, impatient, dismissive. Always sounds like this assignment is beneath him.
skindar.values: Subtlety, competence, secrecy, survival through intelligence
skindar.tooltip: Skindar reflects your character through the lens of espionage and deniable power

levelGreetings.1: Welcome to the farce they call corporate espionage. Your cover is your first weapon.
levelGreetings.2: You survive the basics. Observation, asset management, subtlety. Don’t get comfortable.
levelGreetings.3: You’re picking up tradecraft faster than expected. I’m recalculating your usefulness.
levelGreetings.4: Blending in and manipulating outcomes—you do it well enough.
levelGreetings.5: Halfway to competence. Try not to embarrass me.
levelGreetings.6: Three successful infiltrations. Almost worth my time.
levelGreetings.7: Your reports are credible. High praise. Don’t get cocky.
levelGreetings.8: Senior operative level. Now don’t make me regret this.
levelGreetings.9: You’ve exceeded expectations. Don’t expect compliments.
levelGreetings.10: Master Corporate Agent. Go do your espionage—competently.
